variants.name: build_system
variants.description: Build systems supported by the package

dependencies.name: py-googleapis-common-protos
dependencies.description: Common protobufs used in Google APIs.

dependencies.name: py-numpy
dependencies.description: Fundamental package for array computing in Python.

dependencies.name: py-pandas
dependencies.description:
pandas is a fast, powerful, flexible and easy to use open source data
analysis and manipulation tool, built on top of the Python programming
language.

dependencies.name: py-pip
dependencies.description: The PyPA recommended tool for installing Python packages.

dependencies.name: py-py4j
dependencies.description: Enables Python programs to dynamically access arbitrary Java objects.

dependencies.name: py-pyarrow
dependencies.description:
A cross-language development platform for in-memory data. This package
contains the Python bindings.

dependencies.name: py-setuptools
dependencies.description:
A Python utility that aids in the process of downloading, building,
upgrading, installing, and uninstalling Python packages.

dependencies.name: python-venv
dependencies.description: A Spack managed Python virtual environment

dependent_to.name: py-petastorm
dependent_to.description:
Petastorm is a library enabling the use of Parquet storage from
Tensorflow, Pytorch, and other Python-based ML training frameworks.

dependent_to.name: py-hail
dependent_to.description: Cloud-native genomic dataframes and batch computing (Python API)

dependent_to.name: py-sentry-sdk
dependent_to.description: The new Python SDK for Sentry.io

dependent_to.name: py-horovod
dependent_to.description:
Horovod is a distributed deep learning training framework for
TensorFlow, Keras, PyTorch, and Apache MXNet.

dependent_to.name: py-hyperopt
dependent_to.description:
Hyperopt is a Python library for serial and parallel optimization over
awkward search spaces, which may include real-valued, discrete, and
conditional dimensions.
